statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM healthcare_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, medical_condition FROM healthcare_data WHERE hospital_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, hospital_id FROM healthcare_data WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM healthcare_data WHERE age < 25;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM healthcare_data WHERE medical_condition = 'Diabetes'
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM healthcare_data WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT * FROM healthcare_data WHERE hospital_id = 1 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_condition FROM healthcare_data WHERE hospital_id = 2 ORDER BY patient_id ASC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_location FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription, record_date FROM medical_records WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_location FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';

SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_records.doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith';

SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, record_date FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_records.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY record_date DESC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, patients.patient_age, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.doctor_name FROM patients LEFT JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE patients.patient_age < 40 AND medical_records.prescription <> '' ORDER BY patients.patient_name ASC, patients.patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, dob, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_id, full_name, specialization FROM doctors ORDER BY specialization;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;

SELECT patients.full_name AS patient_name, doctors.full_name AS doctor_name, appointment_date FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT full_name, dob, gender FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT full_name, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT full_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY full_name ASC;

SELECT patients.full_name, doctors.full_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type, facility_location FROM MedicalFacilities WHERE facility_capacity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_experience DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM MedicalFacilities WHERE facility_type='Hospital' AND facility_capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Female';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status='Confirmed';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN medical_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id JOIN doctors d ON mr.doctor_id = d.doctor_id;
